You can still shop here Shopping when Stores are closed Munich Sunday Shopping or after 8pm? See more here! Basics Shopping Guide From arcades through boutiques: here are 8 hotspots for every shopper Shopping Information for Munich: VAT, opening hours Background information which will help you on your shopping spree Ad Traditional Shops in Munich: Dirndl and Lederhosen Shops Ad Shops for Clothes - Tips for shopping: Clothes, Munich fashion designers and their outlets Ad Shopping Arcades: Luxury trends in the sophisticated passages within in the city centre Ad Shopping Malls: Get tips for when visiting Munich shopping centre and shopping malls around the city Ad Pharmacy Munich Help in urgent cases, high quality medicine Ad Typical Munich Shops: International names and designer fashion Famous markets Munich Christmas Market The official Christmas Market shall take place in 2023 Viktualienmarkt: Munich's unique market From fruits to vegetables and classic foods, see what Munich's Viktualienmarkt has to offer. Elisabethmarkt Named after the Princess Elisabeth who became empress of Austria This could also interest you City-News Information from the Munich city administration How the weather will be Sun or rain? The weather forecast (in german) Munich-Webcams Have a view on our city Fliegender Brief muenchen.de als Newsletter! Mit aktuellen Highlights, Tipps und Infos. E-Mail Adresse Rechtsgrundlage für die Verarbeitung Eurer E-Mail Adresse ist Art. 6 Abs. 1 a) DSGVO in Verbindung mit Eurer Einwilligung. Ihr könnte Eure Einwilligung jederzeit mit Wirkung für die Zukunft widerrufen, am Einfachsten durch Anklicken des Abmeldelinks am Ende des entsprechenden E-Mail-Newsletters.
